revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Petalburg Woods |image = [[File:Petalburg Woods.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Petalburg Woods. |tokens = 12,000 |location = South of Rustboro City. }} '''Petalburg Woods''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !! Base Health !! Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena || rowspan=6| <center> 380,000 || rowspan=4|[[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Lyle || rowspan=4|[[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple || rowspan=6| <center> 12,000 |- | [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple |- | [[File:Silcoon.png|40px]] Silcoon |- | [[File:Cascoon.png|40px]] Cascoon |- | [[File:Taillow.png|40px]] Taillow || rowspan=2|[[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher James || rowspan=2|[[File:Nincada.png|40px]] Nincada, [[File:Nincada.png|40px]] Nincada |- | [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish |- ! Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | [[File:Slakoth.png|40px]] '''Slakoth*''' || <center> 860,000 || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena || <center> 860,000 |}
'''*Must have cleared Petalburg Woods at least once to unlock Slakoth'''
